name: Baby Barricade
description:
Info

You are a kindergarten overseer - and the job isn't easy! Don't let those kids start a fight, if you want to avoid trouble. KEEP THEM APART!

This game is a submission to One Game A Month #10 with the theme No Combat, and was developed by a team of 5 during March '22.

How to play

You are in charge of the kids running around the play arena. Drag the kids away from each other and put up protective barriers to stop them from touching each other!

Controls

  • Kids: click and drag them around the arena
  • Barriers: click and drag, use "Q" and "E" to rotate
Programming

  • Tim Neville
